General.Name: Noble Development Public Company Limited
General.Description: Noble Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and sells real estate properties in Thailand. It offers construction, rental and service, and construction consulting services. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
